content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────────────
### Shared Smelting Furnaces Automation Network
Consists of:
• Stone Furnace at Position(x=0.0, y=0.0) configured with burner‐inserters and output chests.
• Stone Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=0.0) with a similar configuration.

### Iron Ore Mining Automation Setup
Consists of:
• Burner‐mining drill connected to a wooden chest and interlinked by transport belts for iron ore extraction.

### Automation Research Lab
Consists of:
• Laboratory receiving automation‐science‐pack inputs and supported by a network of small electric poles.

### Water Supply System for Power Generation with Updated Steam Engine Placement
Consists of:
• Boiler at Position(x=8.0, y=20.5) with connection points at Position(x=8.5, y=18.5) and Position(x=8.5, y=22.5).
• Offshore Pump at Position(x=0.5, y=30.5).
• Pre‐existing Steam Engines:
  – Steam Engine at Position(x=1.5, y=13.5)
  – Steam Engine at Position(x=13.5, y=14.5)
  – Steam Engine at Position(x=19.5, y=14.5)
  – Steam Engine at Position(x=13.5, y=17.5)
  – Steam Engine at Position(x=17.5, y=20.5)
  – Steam Engine at Position(x=11.5, y=20.5)
  – Steam Engine at Position(x=22.5, y=18.5)
  – Steam Engine at Position(x=4.5, y=23.5) [currently unconnected]
• Extra Steam Engine for Improved Integration:
  – Initially placed at Position(x=0.5, y=9.5) (Step 432) with failed pipe connection.
  – Later, the agent picked up a steam engine from Position(x=12.5, y=20.5) and, via automated repositioning routines, successfully placed it at Position(x=12.5, y=21.5) (Step 443). 
  – Subsequent attempts to reposition closer to the boiler’s connection (e.g. near Position(x=8.5, y=22.5)) using both manual candidate selection and automated scanning have failed due to unbuildable candidate areas.
  – Current status: The extra steam engine remains at Position(x=12.5, y=21.5) with unresolved pipe connection issues.

ERROR TIPS
────────────
• Position Invocation Error
 – When accessing a candidate’s center, ensure that the Position object is not mistakenly called as a function. Use proper attribute access rather than invoking center() if it is a property.

• Pipe Connection Failures
 – Verify that the boiler’s connection points and the steam engine’s connection points are aligned and unobstructed.
 – Confirm that no interfering entities block the pipe path; clear or reposition such obstructions before attempting pipe connections.
 – Ensure sufficient pipe components and compatible connection parameters are available to complete the integration.

• Buildable Area and Repositioning Errors
 – Validate candidate positions for buildability before finalizing repositioning. Errors such as “Candidate position not buildable” and “No buildable candidate positions found near desired center” indicate that the selected positions are obstructed.
 – When automated candidate scans in the immediate (±1 tile) search range fail, consider an extended search but be prepared to abort if no valid buildable area is found.
 – In manual repositioning, pre‐check candidate positions for buildability to avoid aborting the routine.
